meanings.definition: The act of choosing a location for something.
meanings.sent1: The siting of the new playground was carefully planned by the city council.
meanings.sent2: The siting of the picnic area near the lake made it a popular spot for families.
meanings.sent3: The siting of the ice cream truck next to the gym was a funny mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her siting of the bird feeder in the garden attracted colorful visitors.
meanings.sent5: The siting of the treasure chest under the old tree was a clever idea.

meanings.definition: The process of placing or positioning something in a particular location.
meanings.sent1: The siting of the chairs around the campfire created a cozy atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The siting of the traffic cones helped direct cars during the event.
meanings.sent3: The siting of the cat on the keyboard caused a funny error message to appear.
